review: Like it and sometimes am frustrated with the slow response time. I thought my issues with it were related to my network, but plugged in my trusty old ATRIX II cell phone and pictures honestly a lot better than the Chromecast. I know I should not be comparing these two side by side, but I did expect better video quality from the Chromecast.Price was not bad at all, a lot of technology packed in there, and hopefully the bugs get worked out.

review: We bought our Chromecast to reduce power consumption -- all our streaming media had previously been through our PlayStation, which eats electricity for breakfast. Aside from some VERY minor bugs that are usually taken care of immediately by software updates, we have had no problem with it. I'd recommend Chromecast to anyone looking for a simple-to-use streaming device.
